tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
I went to Dr.Smiles for checking my wisdom teeth and sensitivity on one my other teeth. Dr. Lakshmi was good enough to examine the nature of my teeth, reason for sensitivity in one of my tooth and how it could be solved through home remedies without any treatment which was more helpful and satisfying solution. 

She also explained me about the issue with my Lower wisdom teeth’s nature of growth, issues that could come up in future and impact to other teeth. 

A quick X-ray around the table was taken and removal surgery was recommended for both my lower wisdom tooth with all required explanations which quickly helped me in taking up a decision right away.

Dr. Lakshmi was quick enough to find a surgeon immediately and arranged for the surgery in next one hour.

A detailed X-ray was taken and Dr.Abdul (Surgeon) was there in clinic with all required equipment to carry on the surgery. He explained me the procedure and patiently answered all my questions as I was quiet nervous about it. Things to take care post surgery was also clearly explained to my satisfaction.

The surgery started, I was given anaesthesia on local area and both my lower wisdom tooth was removed in an hour. Thanks to Dr.Abdul for his quick actions and closing the surgery in a smooth way. 

Dr.Lakshmi was having the precautions to take care documented in a detailed note and list of medicines and why those medicines were prescribed. These helped me in saving time post surgery.

I was kept aware of how the next three days would be and what precautions should be carried out during the time. These were really helpful in crossing the immediate next days post surgery.

There was call from Dr.Smiles on consecutive days asking about how I was doing and helped with my doubts I had.

An overall experience was smooth and I would say the Doctors helped me in crossing the hard days post extraction on a much smoother way.

On 5th day I got my stitches cleared and the surgical site was checked and ensured all are good.

Will recommend Dr.Smiles within Kondapur compared to other many dental clinics that are available in same location.

The cost is comparable and descent as per the enquiries I had with other dental hospital / clinic in Kondapur, Hyderabad.

Keep up the good work Dr.Smiles - Kondapur.

All the staff are experienced, humble and helping. I need to specially mention *** ******* ******** ** * **** **** ****** *** she explained each and every aspect of the treatment and healing process in a detailed way. After the healing she has showed the pictures before and after treatment process and the precautions thats needs to be taken. Also she explained me about the future coming issues and what we need to take precautions for that,  compared to others it is value for mny Great to visit second time and I will recommend.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Scaling / Polishing,Dental Checkup (General),Dental Cleaning,Dental screening and prophylaxis,
review: My first ever visit to dental clinic for check up, Dr. Lakshmi has examined the teeth and clearly explained the status and the treatment to be done to keep it hygienic and healthy. Took treatment for scaling, whitening and bit of filling wherever it is required to avoid decay. She has done perfectly well as I didn't feel any kind of pain during those procedures. Thanks to her friendly approach as well as for clearly explaining about treatment related aspects. Clinic is also very hygienic and staff are very cooperative. Highly recommend to visit..

Doctors at Dr Smiles Dental Clinic are very friendly experienced  and they have explained the treatment very clearly and the steps involved .I was there for Gums Treatment and they explained the process and made me very comfortable. First I felt afraid to get the treatment but Dr Lakshmi explained the procedure very clearly which made me to comfortable to Go ahead with the treatment and with very minute pain I completely get over my gum surgery.Thank you very much for the Doctors and Support staff at Dr Smiles Dental Clinic for their support. I strongly recommend thier services

I took my 3.5-year-old twins and Dr.Lakshmi did a great job. She did not rush and completed the whole process in 4 different sessions over a period of two weeks.  She ensured that kids find the whole process playful and enable her to conduct the treatment which was cleaning and filling (multiple teeth for both). The clinic maintained a high level of sanitization and was spot on the appointment timings with zero wait period.  I would strongly recommend Smile clinic and Dr. Lakshmi Prasanna for their subject knowledge and impeccable patient handling services. Needless to mention, they were quite light on the pocket compared to a lot of clinics that rip you apart charging hefty fees and multiple consultation charges.

Done with my 2 fillings and scaling in 1 seating. Dr Lakshmi and support staff took all COVID precautions during whole process and all are very friendly and listens to all ur problems. Highly recommended for all teeth related issues.

I have visited for a general check up and she said I really didn't have any problem with my teeth but when I told her about my plague she asked me to get scaling done, it really was a pleasant experience.
Out of my curiosity we asked her about root canal and she made time for us and explained a complicated topic to us in a simple, would love to visit her anytime I have something to do with my teeth
